00048 struct user
00049 {
00050    int uin;
00051    QString uid;
00052    QString name;
00053    QPixmap foto;
00054    static bool lessThen (user u1,user u2){return u1.uid < u2.uid;}
00055 };

00058 struct serv
00059 {
00060    QString name;
00061    int sess;
00062    bool operator < (struct serv it){return (it.sess < sess);}
00063 };
